Comments: If missing during the model export, it is exported as 'blankID'
If missing during the model export, it is exported as blankName

Default lower bound values for reactions

Description: Default upper bound values for reactions
Comments: This value is used only if lower bound and upper bound values are not defined

Description: The name of the main model author
The surname of the main model author
An e-mail address of the main model author
The organization of the main model author

Description: The ID for particular MIRIAM entry

Data type: Sparse or Full Matrix of Double
Description: Reaction-to-gene mapping in sparse matrix form

Data type: Column Struct of Cell Array of Strings

Description: Structure with MIRIAM information about the reactions
Comments: If there are multiple miriams, 'name' indexes must match 'value' indexes

Description: The ID for particular MIRIAM entry

Comments: Non-Pubmed references should be written here. PubMed references should be included in rxnMiriams instead

Description: Confidence scores for each reaction (5 - best, 1 - worst)

Description: Structure with MIRIAM information about the genes
Comments: If there are multiple miriams, 'name' indexes must match 'value' indexes

Description: Binary vector, positive for exchange (boundary) metabolites
Comments: This field is removed if boundary metabolites are deleted during the model import
